text: Håkan Westin, born 21 July 1964 in Ed Parish, Sweden, is a Swedish former cross-country skier. He has won Vasaloppet two times: in 1993 and 1996. He is also, 15 generations backwards in time, ancestor of Gustav Vasa. Håkan Westin is the brother of Swedish cross-country skier Marie-Helene Östlund.Horisont 1996, page 58 - Westin tog andra Vasaloppet, Bertmarks 1997 == References == ==External links== *Håkan Westin *Westin Adventure Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers
title: Håkan Westin
